A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Last Jedi could well have been called The Last Star Wars. The disrespect shown to the classic characters and to the Star Wars mythology is astounding. The loosy-goosy\, poorly written\, new characters do very little to save the proceedings. The principals lack the characterization and punch that the originals had in spades. It is impossible to recommend this movie. TFA mortally wounded the saga; this one just plainly killed it. A disgrace.
